1.Title: Invincible Rider
1.Description: The Shield value provided by the equipper increases by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>. When any squad member triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, all squad members' DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>18%</color> and Daze dealt increases by <color=#2BAD00>12%</color> for 20s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
